tool_description: The Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion (DEI) API offers the learning resources, conferences, stories and other information.
title: DEI

api_list.name: GetSamplesByTopic
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://dei2.p.rapidapi.com/samples/{topic}/page/{page}/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "dei2.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
